channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New J6 Transcript Contradicts Hutchinson’s Claims Trump Went Grand Theft Auto
item.description: Lawmakers voted to release testimony previously concealed for contradicting a hyperbolic narrative from the J6 Committee's star witness.
